title: What would have been different if none of the members of The Beatles had ever experimented with drugs? - Quora

response.answer_text: this is not about experimenting with drugs but experimenting with consciousness ,the beatles expanded their mind which reflected on to their music ,if you see Sgt.Peppers lonely hearts they were so ahead of time which does not happen with every other band

They likely would have made better business decisions. I think the Beatles disbanded because of drug abuse, good argument could be made for this. Many,many bands ,organisation s have failed or become unworkable due to drug and alcohol dependency.Creativity comes from the mind not from drugs or alcohol, I think the substance abuse probably detracted from their careers.
